amendment.description: Amendment provides that the National Landscape Conservation System Act does not create an independent federal legal cause of action based on inclusion in the System.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-573 to provide that the National Landscape Conservation System Act does not create an independent federal legal cause of action based on inclusion in the System.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cannon amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Cannon.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cannon amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
